remarks: If the difference between two vectors is zero, they are equal. ( ~ hvsubeq0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodsubeq0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodsubeq0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lmodsubeq0.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lmodsubeq0 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( A .- B ) = .0. <-> A = B ) ) $.
